scripts.deploy: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test:integration: yarn build:contract && cd integration-tests && cargo run --example integration-tests "../contract/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm"
scripts.deps-install: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ..
